products.title: iPhone 15 Ultra
products.details: The iPhone 15 Ultra is the latest flagship smartphone from Apple Inc. It features a stunning Super Retina XDR display, a powerful A15 Bionic chip, and advanced camera capabilities.
products.sustainability: Apple Inc. is committed to sustainability. The iPhone 15 Ultra is made with recycled materials, and Apple has implemented energy-efficient manufacturing processes to reduce its carbon footprint.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S23
products.details: The Samsung Galaxy S23 is a high-performance Android smartphone with a sleek design and innovative features. It boasts a powerful Exynos processor and a stunning Dynamic AMOLED display.
products.sustainability: Samsung Electronics is committed to sustainability. The Galaxy S23 is made with eco-friendly materials, and Samsung has implemented recycling programs to reduce electronic waste.

products.title: Google Pixel 7
products.details: The Google Pixel 7 is a flagship smartphone powered by Google's latest Android operating system. It features an impressive camera system, fast performance, and seamless integration with Google services.
products.sustainability: Google is committed to sustainability. The Pixel 7 is designed with recyclable materials, and Google has implemented energy-efficient practices in its manufacturing facilities.
